word: My brother, you must have periods of rest in which you spend some time in the country. I have been instructed that during the summer you should leave the heat of the city for a cooler atmosphere. Your strained nerves will respond to the grateful restfulness of nature's beautiful scenes.--Letter 79, 1902, pp. 1, 2. (To Elder E. E. Franke, May 23, 1902.)
